net.sf.jameleon.plugin.jiffie.tags
Class AttributeParamTag

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.jelly.TagSupport
      net.sf.jameleon.ParamTag
          net.sf.jameleon.plugin.jiffie.tags.AttributeParamTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.jelly.Tag
public class AttributeParamTag
extends ParamTag

An extension of the ParamTag specific to the Jiffie plug-in. This tag is currently used for the ie-click-html-element tag. Please see the documentation on that tag for an example usage. 


  <ie-attribute>
     <ie-attribute-name>name</ie-attribute-name>
     <ie-attribute-value>submit</ie-attribute-value>
  </ie-attribute>
